channel.title: Adding server
channel.description: i know this might sound like a dumb question but how do you add a server on the moparscape status page i try following on what it says by making an account and logging in with the information but how do log into it with the certain ip address it wants me to

item.title: Adding server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Mitb disabled the login system a few years ago. Ignore the part that tells you to login to your RSPS with a specified account.

(I believe) All you have to do is be on the same computer as the server is on, and add it to the status page from that pc.

So if your server is hosted on a VPS. Go on the VPS, open a browser, log onto moparisthebest.com, and post the advertisement.

Read full topic
